feed.title: Chirpy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Chirpy: v0.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(deps): update dependency next-plausible to v3.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/393
  • chore(deps): update dependency @types/react to v18.0.12 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/384
  • fix(deps): update dependency @sendinblue/client to v3.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/395
  • chore(deps): update graphqlcodegenerator monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/394
  • fix(service-worker): page load failed on firefox by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/397
  • chore(deps): update storybook monorepo to v6.5.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/387
  • chore(deps): update dependency fake-indexeddb to v3.1.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/398
  • fix(deps): update typescript-eslint monorepo to v5.27.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/388
  • chore(deps): update dependency lint-staged to v13.0.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/400
  • feat: support opacity with theme colors, replace custom tailwind typography with the official plugin by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/404
  • fix(deps): update dependency urql to v2.2.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/359
  • fix(deps): update dependency graphql-ws to v5.9.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/309
  • fix(deps): update dependency web-push to v3.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/321
  • chore(deps): update dependency framer-motion to v6.3.11 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/399
  • fix(deps): update dependency next-urql to v3.3.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/403
  • chore(deps): update dependency msw to v0.42.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/401
  • chore: bump packages by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/411
  • feat: control widget theme by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/414
  • feat: fixed doc sidebar; add docs by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/419
  • chore(deps): update dependency @types/node to v16.11.41 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/418
  • chore(deps): update dependency framer-motion to v6.3.13 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/422
  • fix(deps): update dependency @headlessui/react to v1.6.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/420
  • chore(deps): update react monorepo to v18.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/415
  • fix(deps): update tiptap packages by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/412
  • chore(deps): update dependency sass to v1.53.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/426
  • chore: migrate to cypress@10 by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/431
  • fix(deps): update typescript-eslint monorepo to v5.29.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/421
  • chore(deps): update dependency framer-motion to v6.3.15 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/430
  • chore(deps): update dependency postcss-preset-env to v7.7.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/425
  • chore(deps): update dependency lint-staged to v13.0.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/432
  • fix: use ssr urql data by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/434
  • feat: deleted comment link by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/437
  • style: tweak line max length by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/439
  • chore(deps): update dependency turbo to v1.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/436
  • feat: light/dark mode selector by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/440
  • chore: bump to next.js 12.2 by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/443
  • fix(deps): update tiptap packages by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/442
  • fix(deps): update dependency type-fest to v2.15.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/428
  • fix(deps): update dependency cypress to v10.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/361
  • chore(deps): update jest monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/438
  • fix(deps): update dependency graphql-ws to v5.9.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/444
  • chore(deps): update dependency chromatic to v6.7.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/417
  • fix(deps): update dependency nodemailer to v6.7.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/445
  • fix(deps): update dependency react-flatpickr to v3.10.13 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/446
  • chore(deps): update dependency sass-loader to v13.0.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/435
  • fix(deps): update dependency eslint-plugin-prettier to v4.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/447
  • fix(deps): update dependency eslint-plugin-unicorn to v43 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/451
  • chore(deps): update dependency @graphql-codegen/cli to v2.6.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/453
  • chore(deps): update dependency @babel/core to v7.18.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/452
  • fix(home-page): ssr hydration mismatch by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/449
  • fix: revert urql ssr by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/461
  • feat: add faqs by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/462
  • Release by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/467
  • perf: add graphql cache by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/480
  • fix: add axiom logs by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/481
  • fix: save unnecessary queries by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/483
  • Fix/notification/use query instead of subscription by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/484
  • fix: refetch notification message after deleting by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/486
  • feat(playground): remove stale comments every 24hours by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/490
  • fix: email unsubscript not working by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/491
  • fix: theme not sync by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/492
  • fix: revalidate widgets after theme changing by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/494
  • fix(theme): stale theme page after refreshing by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/495

Full Changelog: https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/compare/@chirpy-dev/e2e@0.0.2...v0.1.0

entry.title: New release for Chirpy: v0.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(deps): update tiptap packages to v2.0.0-beta.199 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/497
  • fix(deps): update dependency @headlessui/react to v1.7.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/473
  • refactor: move code to packages by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/502
  • chore(deps): update dependency tailwindcss to v3.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/501
  • chore(deps): update dependency msw to v0.47.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/424
  • fix(deps): update dependency tailwindcss-box-shadow to v2 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/500
  • fix(deps): update dependency tailwindcss-mso to v1.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/499
  • chore(deps): update dependency typescript to v4.8.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/498
  • fix(rte): remove heading select by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/505
  • fix(deps): update dependency @urql/exchange-graphcache to v5.0.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/503
  • fix(docs): cannot load docs on production by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/512
  • feat(docs): add bottom nav links by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/520
  • fix(deps): update dependency cypress to v10.11.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/508
  • fix(deps): update dependency framer-motion to v7.6.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/509
  • fix(deps): update dependency next-connect to v0.13.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/515
  • chore(deps): update dependency turbo to v1.6.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/518
  • chore(deps): update graphqlcodegenerator monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/519
  • fix(deps): update dependency graphql-ws to v5.11.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/511
  • fix(deps): update dependency next-plausible to v3.6.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/506
  • fix(deps): update dependency next-axiom to v0.15.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/514
  • fix(deps): update dependency postcss-preset-env to v7.8.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/507
  • chore(deps): update dependency autoprefixer to v10.4.13 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/477
  • fix(deps): update dependency rehype-pretty-code to v0.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/516
  • fix(deps): update dependency github-slugger to v1.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/510
  • fix(deps): update dependency eslint-plugin-storybook to v0.6.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/493
  • fix: can't sign-in with email by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/525
  • fix(dashboard): missing the project after creating and show error with duplicated domain by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/527
  • fix: bump to nextjs@13 by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/524
  • fix(analytics): missing map and a11y issues by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/532
  • feat(theme): background color by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/537
  • feat(comment-widget): order by new comments by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/540
  • fix(widget): comment widget disappeared after clicking back button by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/542
  • fix(notification): message alignment by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/544
  • fix(docs): mobile view styles issues by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/545

Full Changelog: https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/compare/v0.1.3...v0.2.0
